name: Aftermath Demo (Snowing Clouds)
description:
You find yourself on an operating table, in a run down hospital. You don't know who you are or how you got there, and the objective is to find what happened and try to get out... You don't know what is lurking the hallways.

    This is a demo for an upcoming release of the game Aftermath, but we don't have a release date. Every comment helps as this is our first uploaded project!
